DOC.HEADLINE: GERMAN SENTENCED FOR DESECRATING CEMETERIES
DOC.TEXT: A court Thursday sentenced a man to 2 years and 3 months in prison for desecrating a Jewish cemetery , a Nazi concentration_camp cemetery and a Holocaust memorial . The defendant , a 24-year-old baker , was the fourth to be jailed in the anti-Semitic incidents near Constance on the_Swiss border in October , 1992 .
